title: India delivers another diesel shipment to Sri Lanka
body_lines: A new shipment of diesel from India arrived in Sri Lanka today (May 15) under the credit line for fuel.
The consignment was delivered by Torm Helvig company, the Indian High Commission in Colombo said in a statement.
The latest diesel shipment brings the total shipments delivered by India to 12. India has supplied more than 400,000 metric tonnes of fuel to the island so far.

12 shipments and more than 400,000 MT of fuel!! Latest consignment of #Diesel from #India under the credit line for fuel was delivered in #Colombo by Torm Helvig today. pic.twitter.com/E25xIGbQCA— India in Sri Lanka (@IndiainSL) May 15, 2022
